metaTitle: Testimonials and Reviews | NYC's Premier Men's Aesthetic Clinic
metaDescription: Chris Bustamante and Lushful Aesthetics–a premier aesthetic clinic–have been featured in the New York Post and Daily Mail with expertise in cosmetic procedures.
reviewContent: Second time coming from PA for girth enhancement and I’ll definitely be back in the future. Chris is the man I would never go anywhere else.
reviewContent2: Chris is outstanding. He was incredibly professional. He took the time to explain everything in detail and answer all of my questions to make sure I was comfortable before starting. I would highly recommend him.
reviewContent3: Had an incredible experience Chris was professional, calming, and clearly experienced. The procedure was way more comfortable than I expected, and he made sure I understood every step. I felt totally taken care of from start to finish. Highly recommend!
reviewContent4: Chris is masterful in his skills and a real artist where it counts. My procedure was pain free and very smooth. From what I can tell right after the procedure, I’m going to have some great results. The process and information shared before and after is thorough and well thought out. Thanks Chris and team for making this a great experience.

intro.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Neuromodulators such as BOTOX®, Dysport®, and Xeomin®, are FDA-approved to treat fine lines and wrinkles associated with movement such as frowning and smiling. Lushful Aesthetic’s facial botox injections are performed by Chris Bustamante, DNP, NP-C (@InjectorChris) for both facial and body botox procedures. As a leading aesthetic clinic for men in NYC that is LGBTQ and BIPOC owned, our Aesthetic Clinic’s goal is to create a comfortable space for all, helping to soften facial appearances for those who want to prevent frown lines, a furrowed brow, and more. Facial botox injections can also treat TMJ pain associated with teeth grinding and for masseter muscle reduction.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

by:","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Frowning ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Smiling","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Other Global optimization pricing is for Xeomin®, other toxins are priced at $14/unit.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Post-Facial Botox Assessment","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Patients are always seen two weeks after their Botox appointment to assess if additional Botox is needed. If the patient paid per unit, then additional units required at the two week follow-up will be charged as necessary. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

preCare.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Avoid alcohol consumption for 3 days before receiving facial botox injections. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Consult with your medical provider, discontinue blood thinning medication such as Ibuprofen, Excedrin, Aspirin, Aleve, and Fish Oil a week before injections. postCare.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"No working out for 24 hours after receiving Botox.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"No laying down flat for 4 hours. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"No makeup for 24 hours. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Avoid rubbing the treated areas for 4 hours. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Botox takes 2 weeks to be completely activated. Please allow the full 2 weeks before judging the result. We always schedule patients for a 2 week follow up to be sure the results are optimal.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

featuredAestheticServices.beforeAfterServiceDescription: View our transformative Botox results at Lushful Aesthetics, our expert treatments ensure a natural, refreshed appearance without the undesired frozen look. Our before and after Botox video showcases the significant yet subtle rejuvenation of the treatment. Whether it's your first visit or a follow-up for touch-ups, our personalized assessment ensures you receive the precise units needed for your desired outcome. At Lushful Aesthetics, we prioritize a look that enhances your natural features. We offer an individualized approach to prevent and treat fine lines and wrinkles, ensuring your satisfaction every time you look in the mirror.
featuredAestheticServices.metaDescription: Lushful Aesthetics botox and fillers in NYC treat fine lines and help treat fine lines and wrinkles along with TMJ pain associated with teeth grinding.
featuredAestheticServices.metaTitle: Botox to Prevent Wrinkles in NYC Near Me | Lushful Aesthetics

intro.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Penis fillers are a non-surgical cosmetic procedure, utilizing FDA-approved hyaluronic acid dermal filler, to augment the girth or thickness for satisfactory penis enlargement results at our aesthetic clinic. Both the shaft and the head of the penis can be treated with filler for penile girth enhancement. Penis injections for growth do not change the length of the penis while erect but do prevent full retraction of the penis when flaccid, so patients look longer when flaccid. This procedure for penis growth has no effect (both positive and negative) on erectile performance. This filler treatment is solely for aesthetic purposes. Lushful’s penis filler offers a variety of benefits to enhance sexual experience and confidence:","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Longer length when flaccid","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Increased girth when flaccid and erect","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"No effect on erectile function","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Increased confidence in the bedroom","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

The minimum amount of filler recommended for a first-time treatment is 10 syringes. On ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"average 10-15 syringes is recommended for an optimal result.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"First 10 syringes: $7,500","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"Additional syringes: $600 per syringe","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"italic"}],"value":"In order to receive the discounted pricing, the amount of syringes would need to be utilized in one session.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Touch-ups are priced as:","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"First 5 syringes: $4000","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Second 5 syringes: $700 per additional syringe","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Over 10 syringes: $600 per additional syringe","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

featuredAestheticServices.subheadingTwo: Our Approach to Penile Girth Enhancement

ourApproach.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"GirthFill is our signature Girth Enhancement procedure. Our aesthetic clinic’s technique for how to increase penis girth utilizes hyaluronic acid penis fillers we safely inject along the sides of the penis to create a more girthy penis. Penis growth injections require several syringes to obtain the desired result with minimal downtime. Most patients start with 10-15 syringes for their initial treatment. The longer a patient’s penis is, the more penis filler shots they will require to make a visual impact.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"The desired result in the best male enhancement is to enhance the patient’s confidence. The appropriate amount of penile injections look both aesthetically appealing and feels natural. During your appointment, we will discuss your goals and assess your baseline to determine the appropriate amount of filler for your penile girth enhancement, to help ensure anatomical harmony with the unique shape of your body. Depending on some patients’ budgets or wanting to be conservative, they may require additional treatment to obtain their goals.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"The hyaluronic acid penis fillers slowly fade away over 3 years in the shaft and last around a year in the glans (head of the penis). It’s unlikely the patient will ever fully return to their original baseline due to the small amount of collagen that is created in response to the penis filler.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"We are often sought out by patients who have ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"uri":"https://www.lushfulaesthetics.com/sexual-enhancement-services/penis-filler-revision/"},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"received poor results","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":" from Girth Enhancement procedures from other providers. Chris Bustamante, DNP, NP-C, Aesthetic Nurse Practitioner aka InjectorChris is the leading expert in Penis Filler, including Penis Filler revision work to help patients achieve optimal, natural-looking results. He is skilled in correcting imperfections such as lumps/bumps, asymmetry, and Penis Filler migration issues. His technique for revision utilizes a customized approach of potential micro dissolving and refilling to place filler strategically to deliver the gold standard in penile enlargement with Penis Filler. And unlike most providers, Chris Bustamante, DNP, NP-C has extensive experience working with uncircumcised penises.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

preCare.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Avoid alcohol for a week before receiving penile girth enhancement.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Consult with your medical provider if you can discontinue blood thinning medication such as Ibuprofen, Excedrin, Aspirin, Aleve, and Fish Oil 2 weeks before your penis girth filler procedure.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

We recommend avoiding it for 2 weeks. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"No TriMix ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"injections","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":" for 6 weeks.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Thoroughly wash your penis the day of having your penis filler shots injected.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"After 48 hours, you must begin massaging your penis utilizing moderate pressure for a minimum of 15 minutes per day as demonstrated at the time of your procedure. Continue daily massages for a minimum of 3 weeks.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Any prescribed medication should be completed as instructed.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

featuredAestheticServices.beforeAfterServiceDescription: Our penile enlargement before and after pictures demonstrate the noticeable increase in girth our treatment provides. The penis filler results include a longer appearance when flaccid, increased girth in both flaccid and erect states, and a boost in confidence without impacting erectile function. Please note, to view the penis enlargement before and after images requires providing your name and email, and verification that you are 18 years or older. There are a few crucial factors to note when examining before and after photos to tell when it's professional, which you can learn about [here.](https://www.lushfulaesthetics.com/blog/sexual-enhancement/what-to-look-for-in-penis-filler-before-and-after-photos/)

intro.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Scrofill (scrotal enhancement) involves injecting hyaluronic acid filler into the scrotum's dermal layer, making the scrotum appear larger, fuller, and heavier. This aesthetic clinic male enhancement procedure is all about enhancing the aesthetic of the scrotum and is often combined with penis filler. Scrotum enlargement helps reduce wrinkles and increase the overall size of the scrotum, which patients report makes their sexual experiences more satisfying. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

pricing.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"We will work with you to determine the right amount of scrotum enhancer to work best for you. Some aesthetic clinic patients need more than others to achieve a symmetrical, rounded-out look. We price based on the amount of filler used for optimal ScroFill results, and the pricing is based on the tiers shown below. The minimum amount of filler recommended for a first-time treatment is 10 syringes. On average 15-20 syringes is recommended for an optimal result.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"First 10 syringes: $7,500","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"Additional syringes: $600 per syringe","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"*Combined scrotal and penile filler procedures are priced according to total filler volume. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Touch-ups are priced as:","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"First 5 syringes: $4000","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Second 5 syringes: $700 per additional syringe","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Over 10 syringes: $600 per additional syringe","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

ourApproach.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Scrotum enlargement is a non-invasive procedure accomplished by injecting a thin hyaluronic acid filler into the dermal layer of the scrotum, increasing the size and volume of the scrotum. This makes both the scrotum and testicles appear larger and fuller. Scrotum enhancement results from an aesthetic clinic slowly fade away over approximately 2-3 years, depending on the number of scrotal enhancement injections used.  ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"The hyaluronic acid filler we use in our scrotum injections is safe, as the body naturally produces it in areas such as the eyes, skin, and joints. Hyaluronic acid binds to water molecules, hydrating the skin which helps to maintain skin volume and density. This creates a situation conducive to collagen production.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

preCare.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Avoid alcohol for a week prior to receiving your scrotum enhancer. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Consult with your medical provider if you are able to discontinue blood thinning medication such as Ibuprofen, Excedrin, Aspirin, Aleve, and Fish Oil 2 weeks prior to scrotum filler","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

Please note, to view scrotum filler before and after images, verification of age (18+) and basic information are required.

savedGoogleReviews.text: I had an incredible experience at Lushful Aesthetic! The staff is truly amazing—friendly, attentive, and incredibly knowledgeable about their services and products. They took the time to answer all my questions and made me feel completely at ease. The level of professionalism and care they provide is outstanding. I highly recommend Lushful Aesthetic to anyone looking for top-notch service and expertise. I’ll definitely be coming back!

I’m a returning customer of Lushful Aesthetics. Chris is gentle, communicative, and strategic as to what filler he uses and where he plans to use it and why. I am 100% satisfied with their products. I love my natural looking injections and would never dream of going to anyone else. He is the true MASTER! The staff made my entire experience so pleasant and seamless. Is highly recommended.

Chris and his staff are the consummate professionals; stellar first-rate customer service. Everyone is personable, knowledgeable, helpful and always willing to walk you through and attend to any additional questions you may have. In addition, the facilities are always clean.

I recently visited Lushful Aesthetics and had an exceptional experience. From the moment I walked in, the team was incredibly nice and welcoming, making me feel at ease immediately. Chris was super kind and personable. He made the entire process so easy and comfortable. Chris is truly an expert and knows exactly what he’s doing. I am more than pleased with the results and will definitely be coming back. If you’re considering booking an appointment, don’t think twice—Lushful Aesthetics is the place to go for top-notch service and care. Highly recommend!

I'm a huge fan of Lushful Aesthetics. InjectorChris has done Cheek + Jawline filler for men, lip filler, Girth Enhancement, ScroFill, Laser Hair Removal for men and Botox on me. His attention to detail is the best I've ever seen. He's the go-to expert for Girth Enhancement; I was shocked with his amazing portfolio. The whole office was super clean, professional and always a great experience. Highly recommend InjectorChris.

Lushful Aesthetics and Injector Chris exceeded all my expectations as a first time botox user. From the moment I arrived, his professionalism, kindness, and skill put me at ease. Tailoring the treatment to my facial wants and needs, Chris delivered outstanding results, leaving me with a natural, refreshed look. Lushful Aesthetics is the go-to destination for anyone seeking exceptional aesthetic treatments and surgeries!!! :)

I came across Chris and his wonderful team over a year ago and it's been one of the best things to happen to my skin and body in many years! Chris is the utmost consummate pro and has left my skin and body looking amazing. His eye for perfection and techniques continue to reverse my age and are cutting edge - I know his dedication to clients and commitment to excellence is what makes me coming back all the time to feel and look like my best self. I super recommend Chris and the entire Lushful Aesthetics team to anyone who wants to look their best.

I had seen Chris's natural lip fillers on Instagram and was very impressed. I was very nervous because I'd heard how painful the procedure could be, but Chris went well out of his way to make me feel comfortable and it didn't hurt hardly at all. I am so, so pleased with the results and will definitely be back. I can't recommend Lushful enough.
procedure. Would definitely recommend this place! Ill be returning thanks chris
HoleTox is great, and I would only trust Chris to do it. Trying TrapTox next.

Being going to Lushful Aesthetics for over 2 years. I love my results from the Lushful Instant BBL, Cheek + Jawline Filler, Botox and Lip Filler. Chris has such a precise eye for detail and I'm always getting so many compliments. He's truly an artist and I highly recommend everyone visit InjectorChris at Lushful Aesthetics.

I never considered laser hair removal until my partner told me he was interested and found Dr. Chris. I didn't know what to expect but we both bought a package and made our appointments. Dr. Chris was excellent in helping us understand how the process works and what we could expect. He was clearly very knowledgeable but also extremely patient and kind in answering all our questions. We are both so happy with our results and would recommend him to anyone!
Chris is amazing! Have been going to him for almost 2 years for laser hair removal and injectables. Extremely knowledgeable and provides perfect results! The Best!

I've been going to Chris for about 2 years, getting everything from Botox and micro needling to hydro facials and chemical peels. My skin has never looked better. I always feel super comfortable and never pressured to add on or stack more treatments.

Chris' work is immaculate. I recently dipped my toes into lip filler and I'm so happy with the results. Chris walked me through the process and his approach to filler on a few occasions as well as what to expect for healing. And as with every treatment he is available afterwards over text to answer any questions and check in on my healing.

The office staff are also amazing and kind and do everything to accommodate my often hectic schedule and any last minute changes.

Cannot recommend Lushful Aesthetics enough!

I’ve been coming to Lushful Aesthetics for years, primarily for laser hair removal (best money I’ve ever spent). I started to become interested in injectables from seeing the ads on instagram. Based on the things I wanted to improve, Chris suggested that I do lip filler and cheek / jaw filler. Chris is an incredibly talented injector that takes the time to learn the patients unique anatomy to create a final product that has you looking like the very best version of yourself. Chris does a great job at explaining the process and making you feel comfortable throughout. I was so happy with my results, they were long-lasting and subtle. I definitely recommend Chris if you’re considering any injectable procedures.

I have been seeing InjectorChris for years now. I've had laser hair removal and Shockwave Therapy + P-Shot. I LOVE the results. They're both such impactful treatments. Highly recommend InjectorChris at Lushful Aesthetics. Great space and very professional.

From start to finish, this was an amazing experience visiting Lushful. I booked a Hydrafacial with Marco and it for sure was the best one I have ever gotten. He made sure to take his time to ensure my face was feeling brand new at the end. He even recommended products for my skin’s problem areas. I ended up booking a facial package because the overall quality of everything was top tier. Also, I have to add the staff is very polite and accommodating. 10 out of 10 recommend everyone should give them a visit. I am excited to try some of the other procedures they offer as well!

Dr. Chris is truly the best! I shared how anxious I was about the session and he instantly made me feel comfortable by his warm and welcoming attitude. We started the session by talking about my concerns and he took the time to make his recommendations and walk me through the process. Dr. Chris cares about his clients. The day after my treatment, he contacted me to see how I was feeling and answer any questions. The 6 week complimentary follow up was really helpful in achieving my appearance goals. 10/10!

I have been associated with Chris for closer to a year now and I have taken advantage of a couple of aesthetic services that have helped me in not only boosting my confidence but also making my life easier for good. If you’re looking for any such services then Dr. Chris (Injector Chris) is your go to. This is definitely not a paid review because I have spent my money and have benefited greatly from it. There are so many aestheticians out there who does the job for half of the price but can never match the quality of work and products that Chris provides to his clients. Good luck, Chris. You deserve the world.

I had been putting off getting Botox again for years and I am so grateful I found Lushful Aesthetics. I was so nervous about finding someone I could trust but, InjectorChris and his staff put me at ease almost immediately.

 The office was easy to locate, clean and state of the art. Someone was there to provide support every step of the way from the moment I walked in. InjectorChris explained everything in great detail and really made me feel like he was looking out for my best interest. The appointment never felt rushed and I left feeling like my needs were met appropriately. I am already getting compliments and cannot wait to go back for other services!

My had the most amazing experience at Lushful Aesthetics with Injector Chris. Everything from the booking of my appointment, to the cleanliness of the spa and the super adorable and friendly assistants upon arrival, to my service with Chris were all above my expectations and I couldn’t have been more thrilled. 

 I was so nervous about my decision to do Botox, but Chris was so very informative and did such a great job educating me and explaining the entire process during my consultation and on the day of my services, I was extremely excited and confident. He was so sweet and patient and super professional.

 We shared so many laughs that I left the spa feeling like a friend and not just a client.

 My results are amazing and I could not be more happy. I will most definitely be back soon for another service.

 I love love love it here! :)

Meeting Chris was a pleasure and made my experience even better. I go to Lushful for laser hair removal on my face, neck, and underarms. This will be my 4th session and my results have been significant! Basically painless as well. Pigment and hair thickness/growth have substantially subsided. I go once a month and look forward to the ease of everything. The office is super clean and modern which I enjoy. I recommend Lushful and Chris very highly!

I had been wanting to get lip filler for a very long time. I felt that I didn’t smile in pictures and that my mouth was uneven. I know it’s a small thing to be self-conscious about, but Chris was so helpful and knowledgeable about the product and the process and made me feel heard. He was patient when explaining everything to me and let me ask all my questions with no pressure or expectation. 

 I am beyond happy with my experience and results. Chris took his time and made sure I look great. This small change improved my confidence and of course my appearance. Thank you Chris for a wonderful experience.

Chris and his team are super friendly and always welcome you with a smile. Very professional treatment, while the clinic is always clean and smells good. Easy to book appointments online and by phone. Absolutely recommending.

I only have great things to say about my experience at Lushful Aesthetics. I've had my lip filler done by Chris, he gave me the natural full lips I always wanted! The Aesthetician, Marco did my laser hair removal (such a game changer for not having to deal with ingrown hairs) and Hydrafacial, and the results were amazing. My skin is glowing!! I was very impressed with the teams knowledge and attention to detail. I can’t wait for my next visit!

Run, don't walk, to Lushful Aesthetics! I have seen Injector Chris for facial botox and laser hair removal, and the results are always fantastic. He is extremely consultative and sets proper expectations for the treatment and results, so I feel comfortable both in and out of his office. Plus, he has a lot of experience treating LGBTQ+ patients. I will continue to see Chris for all of my aesthetic needs.

I love this place :) Chris and Marco are more than just professional, they’re so nice and welcoming. They know what they’re doing, and always do the job flawlessly. It’s a very comforting setting; they take really good care of you. Steven is also really accommodating, helpful, and always comes out to greet you with a smile. Everything is fully explained to you. It’s in a great location, the prices are reasonable, and it’s a worthwhile experience /investment!

Been here numerous times for various treatments and been always welcomed with professionalism and various knowledge of procedures. Chris is a very sweet and patient Dr who will truly make you feel comfortable and help you reach whatever needs you’re looking for. Been to other laser hair removal places before and this is by far the absolute best. Been here for filler as well and was so happy with the outcome that lasted me a long while afterwards. Highly recommend anyone looking to revamp yourself!

Chris and his team are true professionals! As an injector he as a creative eye for facial balancing, finesse for Botox placement, and cultivates a supportive atmosphere. His team is communicative and personable. If you’re looking for a LGBTQIA+ aesthetic team that promotes natural results then this is the spot for you!

I can't speak highly enough about InjectorChris! I've had a couple of different treatments done at Lushful Aesthetic and have been extremely pleased with my results. InjectorChris is not only knowledgeable, professional and an expert in his field, but he is also caring, patient and genuinely invested in providing exemplary care with exceptional results. I've worked with various injectors over the years and InjectorChris is hands down the best I've encountered. I have zero reservations about referring folks to him and would rate him 10/10 if I could.

I received my initial series of Laser Hair Removal treatments from Laser Away. While I have a plethora of compliments for Laser Away, they’re staff is made up of entirely women and not consistently as thorough in male areas as I’d like. After seeing some demos on Twitter of InjectorChris’ laser hair removal, I gave him a try. Not only was I more comfortable with a male nurse,tech, whatever you call them- InjectorChris was very thorough and his laser was much more comfortable - it got spicy! But it was definitely more comfortable than the laser at LaserAway. 

 I will return to Lushful Aesthetics and recommend them to any man looking to have hair removed. 5 Star service

This was my first time getting lip filler and to say Dr. Chris and his team was amazing would be an understatement. Dr. Chris walked me through the process before he began, he was personable and made me feel comfortable. The team made me feel apart of the family and I couldn’t be happier with my results. If you’re looking for any kind of beauty upkeep Dr. Chris has the magic touch, and I highly recommend you pay him and his teams visit

I had an amazing experience at Lushful Aesthetics. I decided to get first Botox treatment for my upcoming 40th birthday. Injector Chris was so nice and explained every step of the process and what to expect afterward. His staff was also really kind and made me feel very comfortable. He could tell I was a little nervous being that this was my first time. But his transparency and professionalism really put me at ease. And the results!! I’ve been receiving compliments at work that I looked so refreshed. I highly recommend

I recently had the pleasure of getting Botox from Chris and a Hydrafacial by Marco, and I couldn't be more thrilled with the results and overall experience. 

 Chris is not only highly skilled but also incredibly personable. He took the time to thoroughly discuss my concerns and expectations before the Botox procedure. His expertise was evident as he explained each step of the process, ensuring I felt comfortable and well-informed. The results were fantastic, and I couldn't be happier with the natural-looking outcome. 

 Marco, who performed the HydraFacial, was equally impressive. From the moment I walked in, he made me feel at ease with his friendly and professional demeanor. The Hydrafacial itself was a rejuvenating experience, leaving my skin feeling refreshed and glowing. Marco's attention to detail and passion for skincare were evident throughout the session. 

 I highly recommend Lushful for anyone considering aesthetic treatments. Their expertise, coupled with their warm and friendly approach, made my visit enjoyable, and I will definitely be returning for future treatments. Thank you to the entire team for a fantastic experience!

I have been searching high and low for a NP who can create a balance of symmetry and refinement without going overboard. Chris is very knowledgeable and walks you through each and every step and exactly why he is doing it. His warm kind personality shines when he is doing his work. His team is great and very helpful as well. You can truly tell Chris has a special talent after becoming his patient. I cant wait to go back - booked my appointment right after my checkup!

I’m currently a few sessions into my laser hair removal with Marco and I couldn’t be happier. Marco is really sweet, efficient, and thorough. We’ve been working on cleaning up around my beard (cheeks and neck) and started noticing results after the first session. I’m excited for more! Would highly recommend!

Injector Chris was amazing and still is amazing as I have ongoing treatments to do. I booked him to do laser hair removal on my neck and I must say that I have not seen an ingrown hair since he started the process, I feel so amazing and so confident! I have been dealing with ingrown hairs for 10+ years and nothing else has worked. His treatment is painless, efficient and so quick! I was in and out in 10-15min! I’m just saying if you have not booked him or you’re looking for any cosmetic treatment to make you look like your best self he is the guy, hands-down!!

Lushful Aesthetics by InjectorChris is 5 Stars for multiple reasons. I could go on and on, but to make a long story short please see the below reasons: 

 Reason 1: The office is contemporary and more importantly, clean. 

 Reason 2: Both Chris and the Lushful Aesthetics Team are professional, yet friendly (i.e. great bedside manner). More specifically, I am always welcomed to the office with not only a smile, but also bottled still or sparkling water. Then, during inherently uncomfortable procedures, I am always made to feel as comfortable as possible. 

 Reason 3: RESULTS. (As any aesthetic procedure is an investment, return on investment is essential. My aesthetic procedures at Lushful Aesthetics by InjectorChris are always worth the investment.)

I came in for botox with Chris and a Hydrafacial with Marco and had the loveliest experience! It was my first time getting botox and Chris explained to me exactly where + why I needed it, how it works, what to expect, etc. He worked quickly yet meticulously and I couldn't be happier with my results. The Hydrafacial was super relaxing and spa-like. I don't typically like massages or facials but Marco made me feel so comfortable I think I even fell asleep for a moment or two. Not to mention, my skin was glowing for days after!

Chris is incredible. He has a great bedside manner, explained provided ample education, is highly skilled, I'm thrilled with the results, exceeded my expectations. I highly recommend him. 5 Stars all the way.

I’ve been going to Lushful Aesthetics for my Brazilian Hair Removal laser treatments and love the results. Dr. Chris is extremely welcoming, kind, and thorough. Since I am on the hairier side, I was unsure if this would work for me - but I couldn’t be happier with the results! I would highly recommend Dr. Chris to anyone who wants to achieve a smoother, hairless 🍑 without the pain of shaving or using Nair, and avoiding stubble/ingrown hairs.

I’ve had wonderful experiences at Lushful Aesthetics. Chris is super nice, professional, and thorough while performing procedures. I have received full body and face laser hair removal from him. He’s made me feel very comfortable and safe and I’d recommend him to anyone who wants the same procedures.

Everything about my experience with InjectorChris has been nothing but professional and amazing - from start to finish. I love how thorough and precise he is with his work. I am obsessed with the results and really made me feel comfortable by talking through the process to me. Will definitely be returning for more services!

Highly recommend for anyone looking into non-surgical aesthetic treatments! Injector Chris is very skilled and will give you a personalized consultation, walking you through the treatments that are best for you and your goals. I felt totally at ease in his office and the procedures were done carefully and seamlessly. Most importantly, the results are fantastic!

I came all the way from LA to get my Instant BBL by Chris. The procedure was painless and the results were instant! Chris made me feel comfortable during the entire process and I couldn't be happier. His eye for detail is unmatched and I'm already planning on coming back for more treatments. I would 1000% percent recommend Lushful Aesthetics for anyone that wants an elevated natural look.

I got laser hair removal on my back and LOVE the results! Finally I no longer have to get painful wax sessions 😆 At first I was nervous that the laser hair removal was gonna be painful but it wasn’t! Chris made me feel so comfortable the entire time! And staff was also so lovely and welcoming ❤️

I had never received any type of Botox treatment before going to Lushful Aesthetics. During the initial consultation, Injector Chris made me feel extremely comfortable and he’s very thorough. I was impressed with him and even more impressed with the results! I can’t imagine going to anyone else! Thank you Dr. Chris!

I started getting treatments several years ago and was nervous to leave my 5th Ave Dermatologist (that you used to see in airline magazines as best Drs). I’m hindsight I wish I had met Chris years ago. His kind/friendly bedside manner is so welcoming and non-threatening (unlike where I started)! 

 Meeting Chris from first consult was a pleasure and made my experience even better. I go to Chris/Lushful for freezing my face with dysport as well as laser hair removal on my face and lower regions. My results have been significant, and on my face after only 2 of my 6 treatments, I hardly have to shave (down there too). Pigment and hair thickness/growth have substantially subsided. I go once a month and look forward to the ease of everything. The office is super clean and in great location. I love leaving frozen and and knowing even after minor pain, that I am getting results, supporting kind people, and feeling like I am getting my money’s worth. If you are considering Lushful, stop looking around and book your appointment now, you won’t be disappointed.

While doing diligent research for the facial beauty treatments in NYC, I stumbled upon InjectorChris. He’s very knowledgeable and highly skilled in the beauty profession. I did Botox/filler and I was extremely pleased with the results as he knew what worked best for ME. 

 His professionalism , talents and excellent customer service skills coupled with an impeccably clean workspace and friendly staff, made it a GREAT experience. 

 I Highly recommended him and already booked my next session as he’s in great demand.

I have been going to Chris ever since he opened his business and he always goes the extra mile to make sure I’m comfortable and happy with my results. We have done multiple treatments including botox, laser hair removal, chemical peels and lip filler. I would definitely recommend to anyone who’s looking for a trusted individual with expertise in the field!
Chris is not only super knowledgeable but also very talented. His calming demeanor and comforting personality make each visit a breeze! He also gets it and has great aesthetic taste!!

I have been going to InjectorChris at Lushful for laser hair removal for a few months now. InjectorChris and thw whole staff make me feel very comfortable. The treatment space is modern and clean. I feel well looked after. The laser hair removal is showing me good results after just a few sessions even with more to go. I can definitelt reocmmend Lushful.

Chris is amazing. After years of seeing a different practitioner, I was weary of trying someone new to do my Botox injections. Honestly, he is the best in NYC. He’s got an artist’s eye. Super knowledgeable about the muscles and anatomy of the face. He explained every step of the process and answered all of my questions. I received so many compliments about my face from my coworkers who had no idea that I get Botox. 

 Hands down 5 Stars!!

Lushful Aesthetics is my go-to spot for keeping me fresh. Chris always gets my Botox just right. But I'm even more obsessed with my lips, cheeks and jawline filler. Steven the Practice Manager is always super helpful with scheduling. I recommend Chris to everyone because he really delivers great results everytime.

Arrived at my my appointment earlier than expected. Injector Chris was able to accommodate me regardless. Really appreciated the awesome consultation because where I thought I needed work done was not the issue. Injector Chris told me I would see full results within 2 weeks, but I started seeing a major difference within 2 days! Great Customer Service and clean friendly environment. Highly recommended!
The staff is incredibly friendly and personable. They create a welcoming environment, take the time to educate you, and make sure all your questions are thoroughly answered!

Dr. Chris is an absolute leader in the aesthetic enhancement profession. I have been injected by a number of people over the years and I have never felt more safe than with Dr. Chris. He listens to my goals, always gives me honest feedback and consistently provides excellent results.

Chris is the absolute best! Very professional and instantly puts you at ease. He takes the time to understand his client’s aesthetic goals. The results are tailored to exactly what you are looking for.

Highly recommend, Chris is so professional, informative, and makes time whenever I had any questions, it shows he really cares and made the experience great even though it was new to me and I was nervous. The team is great, Steven in particular was super helpful and overall the atmosphere and attention to detail is superb. Thank you Lushful!

I have seen Chris for nearly two years, and I could not be happier with his work. In fact, I now refuse to see any other aesthetician! Chris is so knowledgeable and precise when it comes to his practice. I trust him and feel safe with any of the procedures he offers. I would recommend his services to anyone.

This was my second time receiving Botox treatment from Dr. Chris. Once again, I am not only satisfied with the services, I am impressed with the patient quality of care. I recommend Dr. Chris if you want a quality injector who know what they are doing. He has a customer for life.

My experience with Injector Chris was phenomenal!!! It was my first time getting any cosmetic enhancements or treatments done and he walked me through everything like a master. He explained what he thought was the best treatment for me to achieve the results I wanted and I couldn’t be more pleased!!

Chris is amazing! He makes you feel comfortable and confident about the treatment. Super knowledgeable and passionate about his work which is evident in the results. I will continue to see him and look forward to my next visit. Great experience!

I only have great things to say about my experience at Lushful Aesthetics. I've had my lips, cheeks and jawline filler done by Chris and I'm always getting compliments. Love how fresh my Botox looks as well and can't forget about the laser hair removal keeping my skin clear and smooth.

I come here often for all my skincare beauty needs. The service is not only great, but the results are stellar. I get so many compliments on my skin and my lips, and Chris’ eye is so good he knows exactly what to do to give you the results you want. 

 I’m super happy! 10/10 recommend.

Chris is amazing! He’s so knowledgeable and very talented and he has a great eye for aesthetics! So nice to be in such an affirming and beautiful space too! Highly recommend Chris for all your skincare needs!

I’ve been a loyal customer at Lushful. InjectorChris !! Is one of the chillest doctors you will meet. The environment is LGBTQIA+ owned. The representation is important for many reasons. He makes you feel comfortable and he creates wonderful results that make you feel more confident. A+.

I recently had the pleasure of receiving my first HydraFacial with Marco at Lushful Esthetics while visiting my son in New York, and I must say, it was an absolutely amazing experience. From the moment I walked in, I was greeted with kindness and care, setting the tone for a truly exceptional service. 

 What impressed me the most was how thoroughly Marco explained each step of the process, outlining the benefits and expected results of the facial. As someone with sensitive skin, I was grateful for the wealth of knowledge I gained about proper skincare and the reasons behind skin sensitivity and dryness. Marco's professionalism and expertise were evident throughout the entire session. 

 The establishment itself was impeccably clean, creating a hygienic and inviting environment. The pleasant aroma that filled the space added to the overall sensory experience, I also appreciated the thoughtful touch of being able to choose my preferred music to accompany the treatment. 

 The overall experience was nothing short of amazing. my face was left with a gorgeous, healthy glow, and I could feel the deep hydration within my skin. Marco truly went above and beyond to address my specific needs and concerns, ensuring that I left feeling satisfied and rejuvenated. 

 I cannot recommend Lushful Esthetics and Marco highly enough. If you're looking for a professional, knowledgeable esthetician who provides exceptional care and delivers outstanding results, look no further. My experience was truly transformative, and I am grateful to Marco for his expertise and the incredible service I received.

Some months ago, I began laser hair removal with a board-certified dermatologist who didn’t seem to practice aesthetic laser hair removal very frequently. The process was impossible—scheduling appointments took forever, and the lasering itself (with an Nd:YAG laser) was extremely slow going (appointments took ~1.5 hours). A friend recommended InjectorChris (Dr. Chris Bustamante), and I was immediately impressed by his rare combination of medical expertise and aesthetic treatment experience. (His prices are also not extortionate—another plus.) My appointments are now *so* easy to schedule, and they only take 15 to 20 min. from start to finish (vs. ~1.5 hours at the other place). InjectorChris has broad experience with different (darker) skin types, which made it possible for him to recommend the (faster-acting) Alexandrite laser over the (slower-acting but sometimes safer) Nd:YAG laser; I’m very glad he did, as this decision helped me to achieve faster, equally side effect-free results. I can’t say lasering is a walk in the park, but InjectorChris makes it bearable and *really* knows what he’s doing—I can’t recommend him more!
Always been treated well by the whole staff here. I’ve felt listened to, cared for and shared plenty of laughs with everyone at the office. Great place that I’d happily recommend.

I have nothing but rave reviews for Lushful Aesthetics! Dr. Chris Bustamante and his staff are friendly and extremely professional. My results are incredible (far better than I ever expected) due to their expertise and attention to detail. Thank you Lushful Aesthetics!

Dr. Bustamante is great—easy going, chill, and helps you decide and understand what treatments to get and why. Since getting skincare and laser hair removal from Lushful, my self-confidence has gone up and I feel great. Couldn’t recommend him highly enough.
